credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
dimensions:
sheet (folded): 7 3/4 x 5 3/4 in. (19.7 x 14.6 cm)
Other (envelope): 10.2 x 19.1 cm (4 x 7 1/2 in.)
title: Letter from Robert Oliver to Charles Prendergast (Montreal)
description: Letterhead: Robert Oliver/ Fine Paintings/ Prints and Handmade Frames/ Montreal. 3 double sided sheets with an envelope. Letterhead on envelope: 1486 Sherbrooke Street, W./ Montreal, Que. This letter asks for advice on gilding frames. Included is an exhibition brochure from the gallery.
